channel.title: Steve vs. Ninjas / @stevevsninjas
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @stevevsninjas. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: [Beck voice] in the time of NFTs they stole my monkey

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: [turns off The Book of Boba Fett, slowly removes glasses, and thoughtfully cleans them with a small cloth] I honestly don't think that was a book
item.dc:creator: @dorsalstream
item.description: [turns off The Book of Boba Fett, slowly removes glasses, and thoughtfully cleans them with a small cloth] I honestly don't think that was a book

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: I hung a live USB cable outside my kitchen window and now a variety of beautiful quadcopters come to drink from it.
item.dc:creator: @stevevsninjas
item.description: I hung a live USB cable outside my kitchen window and now a variety of beautiful quadcopters come to drink from it.

item.title: Familiarity breeds contempt, but if you want contempt with a pedigree, you need a dedicated contempt breeder. We send you home with a little baby resentment and all the support you need to grow it into a prizewinning contempt that will be your companion for years.
item.dc:creator: @stevevsninjas
item.description: Familiarity breeds contempt, but if you want contempt with a pedigree, you need a dedicated contempt breeder. We send you home with a little baby resentment and all the support you need to grow it into a prizewinning contempt that will be your companion for years.

item.title:
RT by @stevevsninjas: Joe Rogan: Yeah I mean, I’ve heard what you’re saying with the towers. How could a jet plane leave a coyote shaped hole in the side of a building.
The Roadrunner: Meep Meep
Joe Rogan: for sure
item.dc:creator: @Sungod_Banished
item.description:
Joe Rogan: Yeah I mean, I’ve heard what you’re saying with the towers. How could a jet plane leave a coyote shaped hole in the side of a building.

The Roadrunner: Meep Meep

Joe Rogan: for sure

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: You guys, I think I found the love shack!
item.dc:creator: @dave_cactus
item.description: You guys, I think I found the love shack!

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: did I “kill a plant” or did the plant not have what it takes to thrive in this fast-paced environment
item.dc:creator: @sarahclazarus
item.description: did I “kill a plant” or did the plant not have what it takes to thrive in this fast-paced environment

item.title:
RT by @stevevsninjas: "Do you think I reference dinosaurs too much when I write?" I asked.
She was silent, like the p in pterodactyl, but it said everything.
item.dc:creator: @thenatewolf
item.description:
"Do you think I reference dinosaurs too much when I write?" I asked.

She was silent, like the p in pterodactyl, but it said everything.

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: Dad: [tied to chair] You'll never make me talk. Bad Guy: *pulls back a velvet curtain revealing a wall with hundreds of thermostats*
item.dc:creator: @stevevsninjas
item.description:
Dad: [tied to chair] You'll never make me talk.
Bad Guy: *pulls back a velvet curtain revealing a wall with hundreds of thermostats*

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: Superman has so many powers yet he can't control that one weird curl on his forehead.
item.dc:creator: @prufrockluvsong
item.description: Superman has so many powers yet he can't control that one weird curl on his forehead.

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: A lot of people think a tweet “does well” if it gets a lot of likes but I think a tweet is a success if it reaches just one person and makes their day even a little bit worse
item.dc:creator: @OctopusCaveman
item.description: A lot of people think a tweet “does well” if it gets a lot of likes but I think a tweet is a success if it reaches just one person and makes their day even a little bit worse

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: [ah-ha synth intro] Got take - a - way From that old run-down strip mall Vietnamese place Plastic taste, so hard to swallow Lying buffet I ate the plastic sandwich from the display Faaaaake bánh mì (fake bánh mì)
item.dc:creator: @stevevsninjas
item.description:
[ah-ha synth intro]
Got take - a - way
From that old run-down strip mall
Vietnamese place
Plastic taste, so hard to swallow
Lying buffet
I ate the plastic sandwich from the display
Faaaaake bánh mì (fake bánh mì)

item.title: RT by @stevevsninjas: Whoever made the almond-milk carton the exact same shape as the chicken-broth carton should have to eat this cereal.
item.dc:creator: @rachelle_mandik
item.description: Whoever made the almond-milk carton the exact same shape as the chicken-broth carton should have to eat this cereal.

item.title:
RT by @stevevsninjas: [aquarium]
me: look at the chorse
wife: it’s seahorse
me: i know how to spell chorse linda

me: look at the chorse

wife: it’s seahorse
